Subclass Master Raina:

Hello? As you know the old method of managing your subclasses are no longer valid and I am fully capable of handling the tasks the old Race Masters were once responsible for.
Do you need any assistance with your subclasses?

Change Level 40-80 subclass without resetting subclass Level. Change subclass (Certificate of Class Change Required)

 Add a new subclass that begins at level 40. Add a new subclass

 Switch a subclass with a new subclass (resets subclass level to 40). Switch subclass
Make one of my subclasses dual class (free). Make dual class
